awd_titl_txt: SBIR Phase I:  Natural Language Processing for Enhanced Sales Communication
awd_abstract_narration:
The broader impact/commercial potential of this Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) Phase I project will result from revolutionizing the way businesses approach sales, by directly and positively impacting sales communication. This, in turn, will lead to increased sales efficiency and increased customer satisfaction, while facilitating the acquisition of new customers and the retention of existing ones. These aspects will directly impact a company's bottom line and improve profitability. While the focus of this project is to build AI technology that can assist sales representatives in their communication, the lessons learnt here and the methods developed will be applicable to other areas where communication is essential, including the medical domain, counseling, or interviews. Furthermore, the goal of this project is to maintain significant involvement of women and under-represented minorities in this woman-owned company.  

This Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) Phase I project focuses on building an intelligent sales platform expected to positively transform the sales process in business-to-business interactions. This will be achieved by creating technology that assists sales agents by increasing the effectiveness of their communication. Building on recent advances in Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning, novel methods and tools will be developed to measure and ensure sales agent responsiveness, accuracy, professionalism, and empathy in relation to customer communication.  This project will leverage a proprietary large-scale dataset of sales emails and associated outcomes as a basis for the machine learning process.  By the end of the Phase I project, this research will enable a direct and data-driven understanding of outcome-oriented sales communication and a quantified  assessment of potential leads.  This will be paramount to the future development of the project and to its impact and success in the marketplace.

This award reflects NSF's statutory mission and has been deemed worthy of support through evaluation using the Foundation's intellectual merit and broader impacts review criteria.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Technology, Innovation, and Partnerships

por.por_cntn:
Millions of conversations take place every day between sales agents and customers to sustain and facilitate the sales process. According to the Department of Labor, out of a workforce of 197 million employees in the United States, 50 million work in sales and office occupations. There is a significant market opportunity for increased efficiency and effectiveness of sales communication. Initium AI is leveraging recent advances in NLP and ML to develop a custom sales platform that enables sales agents to conduct more effective customer communication. Sales agents using our platform will have access to tools that analyze the customer communication and provide actionable feedback that will assist them in increasing the accuracy, professionalism, and empathy of their communication. In addition, the platform will provide sales-focused analytics to mid and upper-management that will facilitate constructive feedback as well as onboard sales agent training.

Intellectual Merit. Initium AI is building an intelligent sales platform expected to positively transform the sales process, by providing the technology to assist the sales agents to increase the effectiveness of their communication. While using our proprietary technologies and datasets during this SBIR Phase I project, we developed novel methods and tools to: (1)  ensure sales agent responsiveness by automatically identifying action items in  customer communication; (2) provide the means to enhance the professionalism of the sales communication by identifying the topics and sentiment in the conversation; and (3) measure the level of empathy in the sales conversation, using an algorithm that leverages linguistic style matching, specialized lexicons, and sentiment scores. In our work, we took advantage of a very large scale dataset to which we have exclusive access, consisting of sales communication in healthcare, which allows our platform to learn the language of effective sales communication. Our work has resulted in three MVPs accessible through API calls.  

Broader Impacts. The Initium AI sales platform will revolutionize the way businesses approach sales,  by directly and positively impacting the sales communication. Extensive conversations with sales agents and managers have indicated the potential of our platform to disrupt how sales communications are conducted. Our platform is expected to lead to increased sales efficiency and increased customer satisfaction, while facilitating the acquisition of new customers and the retention of existing ones. 

Initium AI is a majority women-owned software company. In our Phase I work, we have involved women and under-represented minorities. Initium AI is located in Ann Arbor, Michigan, and its success will help increase tech-related employment opportunities in and around Detroit, also providing a venue to retain graduates in technical fields in Michigan.


Last Modified: 12/24/2021
Modified by: Spencer Vagg
